medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit its identifying number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date and, when required, the time of the creation of the message and optionally to specify other process dates which apply to the whole message.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify references which apply to the whole message and optionally to specify related dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference for the message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify the parties associated with the message.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the reporting party (generally the bank) or the bank on behalf of which the declaration is made when the reporting party is a third party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department for the party to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to specify a communication number for the party, such as phone number, E-mail or fax number.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free text information relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to provide the transaction details corresponding to a payment ordered via a PAYORD/PAYMUL/PAYEXT message or to a BOPINF message received during the relevant period.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the transaction by a current line number.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment identifying the type of reported transaction.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment specifying the identification of the foreign financial institution also involved in the transaction and optionally the account number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the processing date of the transaction.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A segment group to specify references and dates relating to the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify the reference for the transaction such as the serial number of the related PAYORD message or the bank reference of the payment order.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date related to the reference such as the date of the related PAYORD message or the date when the payment order was executed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments identifying the parties related to the transaction such as the Payee and the Payor and, for a declaration on behalf of a third party, their "declaring agent".

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party related to the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department for the party and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to specify a communication number for the contact such as the phone number or fax number.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify the monetary amount of the transaction and any relevant currencies.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify the monetary amount of the transaction and the currency.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the reference currency (e.g. the currency of the account) and the target currency (e.g. the currency of the transfer) of the payment when they are different.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to specify the reason for the transaction. Where the transaction relates to different transactions such as for example composite payments the details of each part of the transaction can be individually specified.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment to specify the reason for the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify information in clear and free form about the reason for the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify the amount and the currency of the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate the different countries involved in the transaction such as country of origin or destination of goods, direct investment country, donation acting country, payment transaction country (creditor or debtor), or the country in which construction work is done.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to specify the details related to transactions on financial securities.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment to identify the type of security (shares, bonds, etc.).

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the quantity of the security.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the face value of the security.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to specify total values for control purposes.
